initialData.name: Current Map
initialData.css: .map-display { width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: #1f2937; border-radius: 8px; padding: 10px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; box-sizing: border-box; } .map-name { color: white; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 10px; } .map-image { max-width: 100%; max-height: calc(100% - 40px); object-fit: contain; }
